channel.title: Client help.... [Delta] Rep++
channel.description:
ok im using DeathzScape Source and client. i got it running and all that..
i changed the crowns and to new ones.. then i restarted server and tested it, they worked.
i logged out and i try to come back it wouldnt let me log on. same with other people. so i re downloaded DeathzScape's Client and re coded it. still same thing. (server is offline) then i go on my cheat client while source is still running and i can get on..
so i tryed re downloading the source and client again... and re code it but i still get same error. it just doesnt let me on with that client....
any way to fix it?

item.title: Client help.... [Delta] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @x_is_me_x x is me x
item.description:
@x_is_me_x wrote:

Request to be closed, i fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help.... [Delta] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Do you happen to get an error either server sided or client sided? If so, post it please. If not, elaborate on this. Custom crowns has nothing to do with the log in packets being sent.

Read full topic
